meanings.definition: Objects kept as a reminder or souvenir of a person or event.
meanings.sent1: She treasured the mementoes from her childhood.
meanings.sent2: The photo album was filled with mementoes of their travels.
meanings.sent3: The mementoes on the shelf told stories of adventures past.
meanings.sent4: Her heart held onto the mementoes of love long gone.
meanings.sent5: The mementoes sparkled with memories of joy and laughter.

meanings.definition: A keepsake or token of remembrance.
meanings.sent1: He gifted her a beautiful memento to cherish.
meanings.sent2: The locket was a precious memento of her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The memento brought a smile to her face every time she saw it.
meanings.sent4: The memento was a small piece of happiness in her life.
meanings.sent5: The memento held within it the essence of their friendship.
